pymagic.office_tools.Excel¶

class pymagic.office_tools.Excel[source]¶

Bases: object

Functions for interacting with Excel.

Methods

open_wb

Opens a Microsoft Excel workbook.

run_macro

Runs a macro in Excel.

save_close

Closes an Excel workbook.
classmethod open_wb(dir)[source]¶

Opens a Microsoft Excel workbook.

Parameters

dir – Path of Excel workbook.

Returns

Opened Excel workbook.

classmethod run_macro(module)[source]¶

Runs a macro in Excel.

Parameters

module – Name of Macro to run.

Returns

Excel Macro that ran.

classmethod save_close(wb, save_changes=False)[source]¶

Closes an Excel workbook.

Parameters

  • wb – Excel workbook.

  • save_changes – Whether or not to save changes when closing the workbook (Default=False).

Returns

Closed Excel workbook.
